input.sentences: the reporter interviewed the shipping executive .
he was talking about the unloading facility being built .
the facility would allow for more ships to be unloaded .
they sat down to talk about the plan some more .
they wrapped the interview up back where they started .
output.sentences: A local reporter traveled to the waterfront to give viewers a glimpse into what happens at the local harbor.
The manager of one of the largest shipping companies explained the process from the time ships dock until they are unloaded.
As they walk along the waterside he goes more in depth about the regulations governing importing goods by sea.
The walk and talk took a while and the couple stopped for a rest near one of the docks.
They returned to the original place of the interview for wrap up.
